Detailed Description

Abstract base class (i.e. interface) for checks to be run during a regression test.

double  eps,
bool &  success,
double &  maxDiff,
bool  log = false 
) [inline, protected]

Are two floats within epsilon (small value) of eachother?

Parameters:
gold - correct value.
gen - value to be tested.
eps - epsilon, small number they can be different but still equivalent.
success - boolean set to false if floats not equivalent.
maxDiff - Maximum difference seen so far.
Returns:
- true if floats equivalent, false otherwise.
